description: As Ethan-Michael Ayers-fresh from the shower-attempts to sign for a package, his towel slips, revealing his stiff, animated cock. 'Don't worry about that-everything happens for a reason,' exclaims cut, muscled bike messenger Jeremy Penn as Ethan-Michael Ayers stoops down to recover himself. Smiling, Jeremy gently guides Ethan-Michael's mouth to his own engorged prick, beginning a scorching session of sucking and fucking which leads to another sort of special delivery!
title: Hot Wheels
